text: Privacy Note:  What you write never leaves your computer.
When you hit the "Be Free" button, your answers will be formatted so that you can copy or print them and share them with whomever you choose, on your own terms. We don't keep your data anywhere.
appOnlyText: If you are using the app, you can save your inventory results to your "Inventory Journal" so that you can look back later to see how you've changed. That also is stored locally and never leaves your computer.
